attributes.action: attend the Durham Miner’s Gala and Big Meeting in 2008 to demonstrate Her Majesty’s Government’s support of this important meeting of working people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ask the Prime Minister to attend this important national event to demonstrate Her Majesty’s Government’s support for the working people of this country. And also to remember and honour the contribution made those miners who worked in treacherous conditions to ensure the economic prosperity of this country today.
